description:
When the weather is questionable, this shell provides just-in-case protection. This convertable jacket's sleeves zip off to go from jacket to vest and back again with the changing conditions. The zippered back pocket provides storage for removed sleeves or other riding essentials.

  • Recycled 100% polyester ripstop fabric with a DWR finish cuts wind and sheds light precipitation
  • Zip-off sleeves and upper back panel
  • 2-way zipper closes smoothly and lets you vent from the top or bottom
  • Hem adjusts from either side
  • BioViz® reflective details
name: Pearl Izumi Quest Barrier Convertible Jacket - Men's
